attributes.action: to stop the war on Pashtoons/Afghans and stop his support for the military actions by pakistani army in Swat, Malakand and Tribal areas along the Afghanistan-Pakistan border
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1.We want the British government to set up a helpline or some sort of support for its citizens caught up in the war as well providing information to relatives here in the UK.
2.to provide help and assistance to its citizens and other displaced by the war ensuring it reaches the needy and does not end up in pockets of corrupt politicians based in Islamabad
3.strongly condemn the current pakistani military campaign in the region especially in Swat Valley
4.help stop the American drone attacks as it is only serving to alienate the majority of Pashtoons. 
5. revise its policy, simply doing more of the same is not an option.
6.Stop the killings of Pashtoons in Pakistan and Afghanistan and end this war on Pashtoons.
